Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters relating to look-at cameras.

bRotEnableX.Wiki: If ON, rotation of the X-axis is enabled for the look-at camera.

bRotEnableY.Wiki: If ON, rotation of the Y-axis is enabled for the look-at camera.

bRotInverse.Wiki: If ON, the rotation start position is flipped by 180 degrees.

bDirPosShootOffsetEnable.AltName: Adjust Look-At Direction with Muzzle Position
bDirPosShootOffsetEnable.Wiki: If ON, the look-at direction is corrected by the muzzle position.

upLimitAngleDeg.Wiki: The upwards limit angle for the look-at camera. In degrees.

downLimitAngleDeg.Wiki: The downwards limit angle for the look-at camera. In degrees.

maxRotSpeedDegPerSecX.Wiki: The maximum rotation velocity to apply per second on the X-axis. In degrees.

turnAccelDPSS_X.Wiki: The angular acceleration on the X-axis to apply. In degrees per second ^ 2.

offsetBaseDmyPolyId.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID to use when correcting the Look-At direction. Applies for the discrepency between the rotation axis and the muzzle position. (-1 is used for the weapon shoot dummy polygon).

leftLimitAngleDeg.Wiki: The leftward limit angle for the look-at camera. In degrees.

rightLimitAngleDeg.Wiki: The rightward limit angle for the look-at camera. In degrees.

maxRotSpeedDegPerSecY.Wiki: The maximum rotation velocity to apply per second on the Y-axis. In degrees.

turnAccelDPSS_Y.Wiki: The angular acceleration on the Y-axis to apply. In degrees per second ^ 2.

lookAheadSecond_Y.Wiki: The minimum duration to look ahead for the height target view position. In seconds.

basePosOffsetY.Wiki: The reference position to use when calculating the direction for a location shifted by this value on the Y-axis from the rotation axis.

predictionShootObserveTime.Wiki: The duration for which a target is observed for, over the specified velocity, for target prediction.

predictionBulletId.Wiki: The bullet ID used for target predicition.

predictionMaxTime.Wiki: The maximum duration later that a target position can be predicted for.

predictionWepSlotIndex.Wiki: The weapone equipment slot number to use for the target predicition (attack action).

bFollowOrbitMode.Wiki: If ON, the control mode for orbiting comes from the root bone of the character.

fadeOutTime.Wiki: The fade out duration if Look-At is disabled.

bLookAtPosFollowTargetMode.Wiki: If ON, the Look-At target position is followed after velocity and acceleration.

bWorldFixRotX.AltName: Fix the X-Axis Rotation relative to World
bWorldFixRotX.Wiki: If ON, the X-axis rotation for Look-At is fixed relative to the World.

bWorldFixRotY.AltName: Fix the Y-Axis Rotation relative to World
bWorldFixRotY.Wiki: If ON, the Y-axis rotation for Look-At is fixed relative to the World.

worldFixRotOffsetAngleDegX.Wiki: The fixed offset angle to use for the world fix on the X-axis. In degrees.

worldFixRotOffsetAngleDegY.Wiki: The fixed offset angle to use for the world fix on the Y-axis. In degrees.

lookAtPosFollowTarget_BaseDmyId.AltName: Track Target Position: Base Dummy Polygon ID
lookAtPosFollowTarget_BaseDmyId.Wiki: The reference dummy polygon ID to use for the track target position mode.

lookAtPosFollowTarget_AcellMPSS.Wiki: The acceleration towards the target in track target position mode. In metres per second ^ 2.

lookAtPosFollowTarget_BrakeMPSS.Wiki: The deceleration in directions other than the target in track target position mode. In metres per second ^ 2.

lookAtPosFollowTarget_MaxSpeedKMH.Wiki: The maximum velocity in track target position mode. In kilometres per hour.

rotRate_X.Wiki: The rotation rate to apply to X-axis rotation. 1 is the target direction, cumulative total from the parent joint.

rotRate_Y.Wiki: The rotation rate to apply to Y-axis rotation. 1 is the target direction, cumulative total from the parent joint.
